main.name: Soladoye Daniel
main.bio: My name is Daniel, I'm a Front-End React Web & Mobile Developer Developer. Currently I'm working as a freelancer. I love learning and using my skills to help buisnesses create innovative products that help generate more revenue and solve real-world problems.
main.contactmessage: You want to get a website? Get in touch with me so we can discuss further
